summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LuminaHR RAG Chat features including local sentence-transformers embeddings, document management, and UI progress dialogs. All backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: RAG system now uses local sentence-transformers (all-MiniLM-L6-v2) instead of OpenAI API - this is a good fix for the embedding failure issue
Vector dimension changed from 1536 to 384 - existing documents with old embeddings won't be searchable until re-uploaded (as noted in agent context)
Progress dialogs provide excellent user feedback during document upload and chat processing
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test admin account
context_for_next_testing_agent: RAG Chat system is fully functional with local embeddings. 3 documents are indexed (Indonesian.pdf, Laos.pdf, Legal-Guide-Employment-Termination-in-Singapore). Timor-Leste is present in ASEAN countries dropdown. Progress dialogs work for both chat and document upload.

RAG_Chat_API.POST /api/admin/chat: PASS - Returns response, sources, session_id, reasoning
RAG_Chat_API.GET /api/admin/chat/documents: PASS - Returns documents list with total count

Signup_Page.Timor-Leste_in_dropdown: PASS - Visible in ASEAN countries dropdown

AI_Chat_UI.Progress_dialog_chat: PASS - Shows 6 steps: Analyzing, Embedding, Searching, Retrieving, Reasoning, Generating
AI_Chat_UI.Progress_dialog_upload: PASS - Shows 7 steps with progress bar
AI_Chat_UI.Document_deletion_UI: PASS - Delete button on hover, confirmation dialog with Cancel/Delete options

Login_Flow.Dashboard_access: PASS - Stats and employees list accessible
